about_the_game:
Galactic Frontiers - Defense Protocol is an immersive tower defense game set in outer space, where players strategically fortify against waves of cosmic invaders using advanced technology and powerful towers.

Created by three-person indie team mañana studios.

Prepare for an odyssey into the far reaches of space with Galactic Frontiers - Defense Protocol. As the commander of humanity's last bastion, you stand resolute against the ceaseless tide of cosmic invaders. Your strategic ingenuity is our beacon of hope, as each wave threatens to engulf our frontier worlds. Erect powerful towers and harness advanced technology to fortify our defenses, forging an impenetrable barrier against encroaching darkness.

Your journey to safeguard humanity unfurls through a series of diverse missions, from daring rescue operations to pivotal defensive standoffs. Each mission presents unique challenges and opportunities to secure the future of our species. With each triumph, humanity edges closer to survival, yet failure is not an option. The stakes loom large, with the fate of our species teetering on the brink with every decision you make.

In the cosmic crucible of Galactic Frontiers - Defense Protocol, the destiny of humanity hangs precariously in the balance. Will you rise to the challenge and steer us toward victory, or will the galaxy succumb to eternal night? The stars await your command, commander. Are you prepared to seize your destiny?

Gameplay

  • Asteroid Mining: Utilize specialized towers to extract valuable resources from asteroids scattered throughout the level, enhancing your economy and fortifications.

  • Node-Based Energy Network: Strategically link towers through an intricate energy grid system, optimizing resource distribution and powering defensive capabilities across your installations.

  • Energy Generation: Erect energy-generating towers to sustain your network, ensuring a steady power supply for your defenses and mining operations.

  • Defense Towers: Choose from a diverse array of defense towers, including projectile, laser, and missile variants, each with unique attributes and tactical advantages.

  • Repel Onslaughts of Enemy Forces: Prepare for relentless assaults from enemy forces and repel waves of invaders using your strategic defenses and resource management skills.

Missions

Engage in 20 thrilling missions spanning the depths of outer space and beyond. Embark on diverse objectives, from diplomatic escort missions to daring rescue operations. Explore uncharted territories, confront hostile alien species, and uncover ancient artifacts as you defend humanity against cosmic threats. Prepare for intense battles, unexpected twists, and epic showdowns in the vast expanse of space.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or Later
  • Processor: Intel i5/Ryzen 5 series (6+ Cores)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070/AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimal game performance is achieved with higher CPU core counts due to our game's scalability with increased core utilization.

short_description: Stand as humanity's shield against relentless waves of cosmic foes in this gripping sci-fi tower defense game. Employ advanced weaponry and deploy strategic defenses to repel enemy hordes across the galaxy's expanse. Can you withstand the onslaught in Galactic Frontiers?

English*, German
